properties.name: Trechtingshausen
properties.desc: This is the Trechtingshausen stop for Burg Reichenstein where we stayed at. From Cologne, we took the RB26 regional train. Travel took 2,5 hours.

properties.name: Bingen Hauptbahnhof
properties.desc: This is the first stop for Bingen from Trechtingshausen. The dock is a short walking distance from here but the next stop is more convenient.

properties.name: Bingen Stadt
properties.desc: This is the second stop for Bingen and where we got off to get to the dock.
